page.title: 04MILLERS FARM
page.content:
The owner of the farm is called Mr. Taylor and he is a sheep farmer. His sheep are called FinnDorsets which are a cross between a Finnish sheep and a Dorset Horn. He has 150 ewes,130 lambs and 6 rams. He breeds them for meat because if you sell them for wool, you only get Â£1_Â£2 for a fleece.
The sheep stay out in the fields until Christmas when they come in for lambing.He takes the sheep to market and hopefully, they are all gone by August.
All his sheep are shorn in the first week of July. The sheep are dipped in a special water which gets rid of pests. This is called{Dipping}.
In his spare time, he rides horses which he has hired.
